item.title: A Picture is Worth 227 Words - Investigating GPT-4o Internals
item.description: Here’s a fact: GPT-4o charges 170 tokens to process each 512x512 tile used in high-res mode. (Let’s ignore the 85 tokens for the low-res master thumbnail for now.) At 0.75 tokens/word, this suggests a picture is worth about 227 words - only a factor of four off from the traditional saying. OK, but why 170? It’s an oddly specific number. Numbers that are just dropped into the codebase without explanation are called “magic numbers” in programming, and 170 is a pretty glaring magic number.
